subject: Brake pedal cable
description_text:
Hello hope you are well, I am just contacting regarding a cable coming from
my brake pedal I can't see where it plugs in. It is only coming from the
brake pedal. Any advice? I have attached the image of the cable

conversations.body_text: Forgot to say that the pedal model is the simsonn pro X ultimates
Hi Aidan,    This is the plug that connects to the baseplate rgb light strip. If you haven't purchased the base plate, you can temporarily remove it.
